Fixed matrim (c5), mslug5 and samsho5. Added unibios (v2.0), kof2003, kof2003a, pnyaa, samsh5sp, samsho5h, svcchaos, svcchaosa, kofse2k4. Removed several hacks and bootlegs.
Added missing SHA1 information in some clones (no functional change).

Updated kof2001, kof2002, mslug4, rotd and matrim to match Kawaks v1.52.
Added kf2k2pls, kof2001h, matrimbl, ms4plus, vlinero, zintrkcd.

Added Metal Slug 4, Neo No Panepon, Bang Bead (original).
Replaced kof2001b (bootleg) with kof2001.
Fixed Savage Reign V2 ROM.
Updated for MAME v0.60.
Added Bang Bead and KOF2001. Included MAME Supplements too.
Updated for MAME v0.59.
Updated for MAME v0.58.
Updated for MAME v0.57.

Changed v2 in mslug3 and clones.
Changes relating to Metal Slug 3.
Removed kof2000d (now the encryption is known) and changed the V3 ROM in kof2000.
Removed the S1 ROM from kof2000d as it will not be needed now.
Added ng-lo.rom to all games, changed various games according to MAME v0.56, added some new games too.
Added garou, nitd, s1945 and sengoku3. Also added graphics ROMs for preisle2.
Added remaining mslug3 ROMs. Change kof99d details (removed decrypted p2).
Added kof99d (Mr.Lee CRCs) and good V-Liner program ROM.
First release.
